derivation.yuyuan_name: Japanese, from mi 'august' + kado 'gate'; the title is a tranferred use of 'gate (to the Imperial palace)', an ancient place of audience. . Compare with Porte

means.word_mean: 1. the emperor of Japan; when regarded as a religious leader the emperor is called tenno
